document_data.name: ''Ensign's Tunic''
document_data.mainbody: '''''[[Ensign's tunic]]s''''' were sets of [[enchanted]] [[light armor]] worn by buccaneers from the [[Nelanther Isles]] off the coast of the [[Sword Coast]].
document_data.Powers: These items were enchanted with ''+1'' enchantments at a cost of reduced reflex speed.
document_data.History: Traditionally, ensigns were the lowers ranking commissioned officers in land military forces. However, as of the late-14{{th}} century [[DR]], ''ensign's tunics'' were given out to the pirates who were the first to act on buccaneer vessels of the [[Sea of Swords]]. These "red shirts" were first to be sent off docked vessels into the unknown, first to be tasked with opening potentially deadly-trapped treasure chests.
